text: yadi ham avatarit karate is quraan ko kisee parvat par, to aap use dekhate ki jhuka ja raha hai tatha kan-kan hota ja raha hai, allaah ke bhay se aur in udaaharanon ka varnan ham logon ke lie kar rahe hain, taaki ve soch-vichaar karen. vah khule tatha chhupe ka jaanane vaala hai. vahee atyant krpaasheel, dayaavaan hai
